name: ezconfig-node
description: Configuration made easy for node application
author: Tiago Fernandes

scripts.build: concurrently "npm run lint"  "npm run clean" && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build:prod: concurrently "npm run lint"  "npm run clean" && tsc -p tsconfig.prod.json
scripts.coverage: rimraf coverage && nyc npm run test
scripts.clean: rimraf build src/**/*.d.ts src/**/*.js src/**/*.js.map test/**/*.d.ts test/**/*.js test/**/*.js.map
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run clean-external && npm install && npm run build
